title: Mercy on Your Soul
description: England and France are no strangers to war, but when Mercy Aymes decides to Flee with her companions across the English Channel in search of refuge, she soon learns there's a war like no other coming her way. Many will die and its all because of her. Only she can put an end to it. Give in to Lucifer's demands or die by the Archangel, Azrael's sword for being an abomination. Either way she'll lose Talus, a Gargoyle and Guardian, and the love of her life.
author: H.M.  Mills
